[1] 200

> 
av.sd.iter <- apply(M.COUNT,1,function(x) sqrt((NRUN-1)/NRUN*var(x)))
> av.sd.iter
 [1] 0.47370877 0.42083251 0.45376205 0.44395946 0.43301270 0.43301270 0.40730824 0.36660606 0.44899889 0.35707142 0.37563280 0.37563280

> count2 <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6,16,26,36,46)
> av.sd.iter[count2]

> round(av.sd.iter[count2],digits = 4)

>
